definition: lit. the mountains crumble and the trees lie ruined/a great sage has died (idiom)
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
bad/spoiled/broken/to break down/(suffix) to the utmost
